vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Amana = "support"
This name is used for:
1) a river flowing into the plain of Damascus from Antilebanon
2) mountainous area of the river's origin
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞瑪拿 这个專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "支持"
1) 一條從安替黎巴嫩山脈流入大馬色平原的河流
(王下 5:12|; 中文聖經採取用071,譯作"亞罷拿")
2) 河流源頭山區的範圍 (歌 4:8)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚玛拿 这个专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "支持"
1) 一条从安替黎巴嫩山脉流入大马色平原的河流
(王下 5:12|; 中文圣经采取用071,译作"亚罢拿")
2) 河流源头山区的范围 (歌 4:8)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of a.va.nah (אֲבָנָה "Abana" H0071)
§ Amana = "support"
This name is used for:
1) a river flowing into the plain of Damascus from Antilebanon
2) mountainous area of the river's origin
